body: Thanks, Antonello! However, it seems the **latest** **bar chart component** is not able to read the output variable directly from the **latest** **read ep results component**, what I got is some kind of line chart: [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/2FjpMK*bX1ZyJPu5ZsUcOhdTEuVU2RbT74yLZWFUfJJ8JzgQ7b780wwIgSjNfTA4Ah6E3UzosqOXKm-tKeG7DaTc2P*1sxmO/Image8.png) Other than that, you suggestion is working nicely: [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/2FjpMK*bX1ZrAz*wkJOilCP8gVsUPIxWN9muOvmx*d7-i1q2BMXAbHN0JdGGKn3*E5MdG92MfFqIBM3Hv0jrgAwMRcVOAx4J/Image9.png) However, the non-stackValue option is still not working in my workflow, hope you and Chris can kindly advise (see the demo file attached): [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/2FjpMK*bX1ZKXX-921iooXwRFxUK*bI9M3lkDohlgDK4htTod6MkIazz6ABPwmFFk-nxci7Y0CRNld4u*EUjn6OyFRvxDMD8/Image10.png) Thank you both! -Ji
